name: Card Mania
description:
"Card Master" is an addictive relaxing card merge puzzle game. In the game, you need to match 3 cards with same number. Challenge your mind and solve the puzzles, and then you will find them easy and exciting!

How to play?
⁃ Tap to cards to move them to the bottom box.
⁃ The same Cards will be merged to a larger number card.
⁃ No Time Limited!
⁃ Just Tap!

Features:
⁃ Beautifully easy and simple, no pressure and no time limit.
⁃ Challenging to break your highest score.
⁃ Easy to play. Classic merge game and card game for all ages!
⁃ Multiple beautiful background pictures.
⁃ Multiple materials of cards. Such as: iron, crystal, wood…

Come and play this game and become a master of Card Merge Game now!
